00027 
00028 #include "util/Util.h"
00029 
00030 int
00031 main(int argc,char* argv[])
00032 {
00033   uint64_t free;
00034   uint64_t total;
00035   uint64_t swapAvail;
00036   uint64_t memAvail;
00037 
00038 #ifdef __linux__
00039   if (argc==2) {
00040     printf("Reading linux /proc/meminfo from '%s' for testing:\n",argv[1]);
00041     memInfo_linux(argv[1],free,total,swapAvail,memAvail);
00042   } else {
00043     Util::memInfo(free,total,swapAvail,memAvail);
00044   }
00045 #else
00046   Util::memInfo(free,total,swapAvail,memAvail);
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #define B_FMT "%12llu  "
00050 #define B_CVT(x) ((long long unsigned int)x)
00051   printf("meminfo: free=" B_FMT "total=" B_FMT "swapAvail=" B_FMT "memAvail=" B_FMT "\n",
00052          B_CVT(free),B_CVT(total),B_CVT(swapAvail),B_CVT(memAvail));
00053   //
00054 #define M_FMT "%10.3fMB  "
00055 #define M_CVT(x) (x/(1024.0*1024))
00056 
00057   printf("meminfo: free=" M_FMT "total=" M_FMT "swapAvail=" M_FMT "memAvail=" M_FMT "\n",
00058          M_CVT(free),M_CVT(total),M_CVT(swapAvail),M_CVT(memAvail));
00059 
00060   return 0;
00061 }
